## setStatusCode() function

Creates a new response with a new status code

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setStatusCode<B>(resObject: ResponseObject<B>, statusCode: number): ResponseObject<B>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resObject | <code>ResponseObject&lt;B&gt;</code> | The response to set the code to |
|  statusCode | <code>number</code> | HTTP status code |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ResponseObject<B>`

New response with the new statusCode
